hero.title: Videos: compact lessons, clear tasks
hero.subtitle: These videos are built for training—not entertainment. Each one focuses on one idea across Mind, Market, or Price Action, and aims to end with a concrete task you can write down and review later. Rebuild perception and execution first; use video as a prompt to practice clarity, not as a shortcut to signals.
highlights: Short format to reduce noise and keep attention on execution.
A training task attached whenever possible.
Designed to pair with articles and templates.
hero.risk: Educational content only. Not investment advice; trading involves risk.
